Eliminate all and from the game by any means necessary. Each role has a unique way of accomplishing their goal. From mass-killing to framing others, they have to find any means necessary to win.

Below are settings to make the game more balanced based on your lobby's style of gameplay:
  • know the roles of other
    • You'll know the roles of other by their role below their name and color
    • You can turn this or
  • know
    • You'll know the by their role below their name and color
    • You can turn this or
  • can kill
    • can kill using their respective kill button ability
    • You can turn this or

  • know each other
    • You'll know who the other are by their color name
    • You can turn this or
  • know
    • You'll know the roles of other by their role below their name and color
    • You can turn this or
  • can kill
    • with roles will be able to kill
    • You can turn this or
  • have vision
    • have maximum vision
    • You can turn this or
  • can fix sabotages
    • Turning this will essentially give the Fool Add-on by default.
    • You can turn this or

  • 's Kill Cooldown
    • The cooldown for 's kill ability

  • Default Shapeshift Cooldown

    • The default cooldown for any with the ability to shapeshift
    • From 5 (minumum) to 995 (maximum) seconds with 5 seconds intervals
  • can't sabotage after they've died
    • can't call any sabotages after they die
    • You can turn this or
